description: Main frontend React component for the knowledge base assistant web application. Implements theme switching, file upload, question input, and renders subcomponents for visualization and reference display.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: Main React component for the application's frontend UI, managing state related to theme, file uploads, queries, modals, and rendering child components.

methods.name: handleFinishOnboarding
methods.description: Marks onboarding as completed, hides onboarding modal, and stores the state in local storage.

methods.name: handleFileSelected
methods.description: Handles file selection or drop, manages upload process, progress, success, and error states.

methods.name: onFileChange
methods.description: Trigger for file input change event, initiates file upload.

methods.name: onDragOver
methods.description: Handles drag over event to set UI state for drag-and-drop.

methods.name: onDragLeave
methods.description: Handles drag leave event to reset drag UI state.

methods.name: onDrop
methods.description: Handles file drop event, initiates file upload.

methods.name: handleQuerySubmit
methods.description: Submits user question, manages loading, success, and error states for answer retrieval.

methods.name: renderQueryBar
methods.description: Renders the search/query input area and displays answers and references.

methods.name: renderUploadArea
methods.description: Renders the area for drag-and-drop or browsing files for upload, including progress and results display.
